title: Looking for t206 Ty Cobb, Mathewson, Cy Young
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: Looking for t206 Ty Cobb, Mathewson, Cy Young
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase the following cards:

t206 Ty cobb - Any of the four
T206 Cy young - Portrait
T206 Mathewson - Dark Cap

I am not looking for high end, just a decently presented card.

Please send all scans/emails to [url]piannicelli89@yahoo.com[/url]

Thank you,

Peter Iannicelli
